getSelectVarsInQuery

public List<String> getSelectVarsInQuery(QueryExecution qexec)
                                  throws HadoopRDFException
A method that retrieves the variables in the SELECT clause of the given SPARQL query. This method can only be called once the query is executed.

Parameters:
qexec - - the QueryExecution object associated with the query
